title: Wanted to make sujood as sahu before Salam but forgot & made it after, is prayer valid? Assimalhake
transcript: [Music] from india says he made the mistake he was totally confused whether he performed one sajdah or two so he added another sajdah which is totally legit and instead of performing the two prostrations of forgetfulness before salaam he forgot and offered the salaam and then he offered the two prostrations after the salaam is his prayer valid prayer is valid without any problem alhamdulillah you
